Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class AmmoSquare

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.model.Square
      • it.polimi.ingsw.model.AmmoSquare
  • public class AmmoSquare
extends Square
    This class represents a square that contains an AmmoCard that can be grabbed

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private AmmoCard ammoCard
      The current AmmoCard on the Square
      private AmmoDeck ammoDeck
      The deck with all remaining and discarded AmmoCards It is used to refill the square at the end of the turn and to addTarget discarded AmmoCards

      • Fields inherited from class it.polimi.ingsw.model.Square

        east, name, north, players, south, west, x, y

      This constructor is a copy constructor, it create a new Square that is the copy of a given one
      AmmoSquare​(java.lang.String name, int y, int x, SquareBorder[] borders, AmmoDeck ammoDeck)
      Create a new AmmoSquare as a part of the GameBoard, it also draw the first AmmoCard

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      java.util.List<java.lang.String> getCardsCost()

      This method gives to a Player the resources written on the AmmoCard, if available.
      boolean isEmpty()  
      void refill()
      This method addTarget a new AmmoCard to the AmmoSquare at the end of the Turn if it was grabbed this turn

      • ammoDeck

        private AmmoDeck ammoDeck
        The deck with all remaining and discarded AmmoCards It is used to refill the square at the end of the turn and to addTarget discarded AmmoCards

    • Constructor Detail

      • AmmoSquare

        public AmmoSquare​(java.lang.String name,
                  int y,
                  int x,
                  SquareBorder[] borders,
                  AmmoDeck ammoDeck)
        Create a new AmmoSquare as a part of the GameBoard, it also draw the first AmmoCard
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the square, from 'A' to 'I'
        y - The first coordinate
        x - The second coordinate
        borders - The 4 SquareBorder, one for each cardinal direction
        ammoDeck - The AmmoDeck for refill and to addTarget discarded AmmoCards

      • AmmoSquare

        public AmmoSquare​(Square ammoSquare,
                  GameBoard clonedGameBoard,
                  AmmoDeck clonedAmmoDeck)
        This constructor is a copy constructor, it create a new Square that is the copy of a given one
        Parameters:
        ammoSquare - The Square that has to be copied
        clonedGameBoard - The already cloned GameBoard
        clonedAmmoDeck - The already cloned AmmoDeck

    • Method Detail

      • grab

        public java.util.List<Branch> grab​(Player player,
                                   java.util.List<PowerUpCard> powerUpCards)
        This method gives to a Player the resources written on the AmmoCard, if available. It is used through a GrabAction
        Specified by:
        grab in class Square
        Parameters:
        player - The Player in which addTarget the resources (Ammo and PowerUpCard)
        powerUpCards - It's always an empty list and not used hero, only for SpawnAndShopSquare
        Returns:
        A single Branch from which the GrabAction can be confirmed by the Player

      • isEmpty

        public boolean isEmpty()

      • refill

        public void refill()
        This method addTarget a new AmmoCard to the AmmoSquare at the end of the Turn if it was grabbed this turn
        Specified by:
        refill in class Square

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getCardsName()

        Specified by:
